description: Facebook is a social media and advertising platform used by individuals and businesses to connect, share content, and promote products or services. Only supports Facebook Pages, not Facebook Personal accounts.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_ADD_PHOTOS_TO_ALBUM
capabilities.description: Adds photos to an existing Facebook album. Note: Currently adds one photo at a time. For true batch upload, use Facebook's batch API endpoint directly.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_ADD_REACTION
capabilities.description: Adds a reaction to a Facebook post or comment. Note: Due to API limitations, only LIKE reactions can be added programmatically.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_ASSIGN_PAGE_TASK
capabilities.description: Assigns tasks/roles to a user for a specific Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_CREATE_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Creates a comment on a Facebook post or replies to an existing comment.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_CREATE_PHOTO_ALBUM
capabilities.description: Creates a new photo album on a Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_CREATE_PHOTO_POST
capabilities.description: Creates a photo post on a Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_CREATE_POST
capabilities.description: Creates a new post on a Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_CREATE_VIDEO_POST
capabilities.description: Creates a video post on a Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_DELETE_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Deletes a Facebook comment.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_DELETE_POST
capabilities.description: Deletes a Facebook Page post.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Retrieves details of a specific Facebook comment.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_COMMENTS
capabilities.description: Retrieves comments from a Facebook post or comment (for replies).

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_CONVERSATION_MESSAGES
capabilities.description: Retrieves messages from a specific conversation.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_CURRENT_USER
capabilities.description: Validates the access token and retrieves the current user's profile via /me.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_MESSAGE_DETAILS
capabilities.description: Retrieves details of a specific message sent or received by the Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_PAGE_CONVERSATIONS
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of conversations between users and the Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_PAGE_DETAILS
capabilities.description: Fetches details about a specific Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_PAGE_INSIGHTS
capabilities.description: Retrieves analytics and insights for a Facebook Page. Returns metrics like impressions, page views, fan counts, and engagement data.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_PAGE_PHOTOS
capabilities.description: Retrieves photos from a Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_PAGE_POSTS
capabilities.description: Retrieves posts from a Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_PAGE_ROLES
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of people and their tasks/roles on a Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_PAGE_VIDEOS
capabilities.description: Retrieves videos from a Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_POST
capabilities.description: Retrieves details of a specific Facebook post.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_POST_INSIGHTS
capabilities.description: Retrieves analytics and insights for a specific Facebook post. Returns metrics like impressions, clicks, and engagement data.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_POST_REACTIONS
capabilities.description: Retrieves reactions (like, love, wow, etc.) for a Facebook post.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_SCHEDULED_POSTS
capabilities.description: Retrieves scheduled and unpublished posts for a Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_GET_USER_PAGES
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of Pages the user manages, including tasks and access tokens.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_LIKE_POST_OR_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Likes a Facebook post or comment.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_LIST_MANAGED_PAGES
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of Facebook Pages that the user manages, including page details, access tokens, and tasks.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_MARK_MESSAGE_SEEN
capabilities.description: Marks a user's message as seen by the Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_PUBLISH_SCHEDULED_POST
capabilities.description: Publishes a previously scheduled or unpublished Facebook post immediately.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_REMOVE_PAGE_TASK
capabilities.description: Removes a user's tasks/access from a specific Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_RESCHEDULE_POST
capabilities.description: Changes the scheduled publish time of an unpublished Facebook post.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_SEARCH_PAGES
capabilities.description: Searches for Facebook Pages based on a query string. Returns pages matching the search criteria with requested fields. IMPORTANT: This endpoint requires App Review approval for one of: - 'Page Public Content Access' feature - 'Page Public Metadata Access' feature Without App Review approval, this endpoint will return Error #10. To search pages, submit your app for review with the required feature.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_SEND_MEDIA_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Sends a media message (image, video, audio, or file) from the Page to a user.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_SEND_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Sends a text message from the Page to a user via Messenger.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_TOGGLE_TYPING_INDICATOR
capabilities.description: Shows or hides the typing indicator for a user in Messenger.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_UNLIKE_POST_OR_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Removes a like from a Facebook post or comment.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_UPDATE_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Updates an existing Facebook comment.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_UPDATE_PAGE_SETTINGS
capabilities.description: Updates settings for a specific Facebook Page.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_UPDATE_POST
capabilities.description: Updates an existing Facebook Page post.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_UPLOAD_PHOTO
capabilities.description: Uploads a photo file directly to a Facebook Page. Supports local file upload up to 10MB.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_UPLOAD_PHOTOS_BATCH
capabilities.description: Uploads multiple photo files in batch to a Facebook Page or Album. Uses Facebook's batch API for efficient multi-photo upload. Maximum 50 photos per batch.

capabilities.name: FACEBOOK_UPLOAD_VIDEO
capabilities.description: Uploads a video file directly to a Facebook Page. Supports local file upload. For large videos (>100MB), uses resumable upload.
